# s3 - Efficient Yet Effective Search Agent Training via RL ***You Don't Need That Much Data to Train a Search Agent***

**Performance Overview:** ## What is s3?
**s3 Framework**
`s3` is a simple yet powerful framework for training search agents in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). It teaches language models how to search more effectivelyâ€”without changing the generator itself. By focusing solely on the search component, `s3` achieves strong performance across QA tasks with just a fraction of the data used by prior methods. It's modular, efficient, and designed to work seamlessly with any black-box LLM. ## Table of Contents - [ğŸ“¦ Installation](#-installation) - [ğŸ’¡ Preparation](#-preparation) - [ğŸ‹ï¸ Run Training](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#%EF%B8%8F-run-training) - [ğŸ” Run Search/Retrieval](https://github.com/pat-jj/s3?tab=readme-ov-file#-run-searchretrieval) - [ğŸ“ˆ Run Evaluation](#-run-evaluation) ## ğŸ“¦ Installation **Searcher & Generator Environment**

Content:
```bash
conda create -n s3 python=3.9
# install torch [or you can skip this step and let vllm to install the correct version for you]
pip install torch==2.4.0 --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
# install vllm
pip3 install vllm==0.6.3 # or you can install 0.5.4, 0.4.2 and 0.3.1
pip3 install ray

# verl
cd code
pip install -e .

# flash attention 2
pip3 install flash-attn --no-build-isolation

# we use pyserini for efficient retrieval and evaluation
pip install pyserini    # the version we used is 0.22.1

# quality of life
pip install wandb IPython matplotlib huggingface_hub
```
Translation:
```bash

# install torch [or you can skip this step and let vllm to install the correct version for you]

# install vllm
pip3 install vllm==0.6.3 # or you can install 0.5.4, 0.4.2 and 0.3.1
pip3 install ray

# verl
cd code
pip install -e .

# flash attention 2
pip3 install flash-attn --no-build-isolation

# we use pyserini for efficient retrieval and evaluation
pip install pyserini    # the version we used is 0.22.1

# quality of life
pip install wandb IPython matplotlib huggingface_hub
```

```bash
conda create -n ret python=3.10
conda activate ret

conda install pytorch==2.4.0 torchvision==0.19.0 torchaudio==2.4.0 pytorch-cuda=12.1 -c pytorch -c nvidia
pip install transformers datasets pyserini

pip install uvicorn fastapi
```
